alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:59PM MDT until June 03 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN PUEBLO COUNTY... At 359 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles south of Salt Creek to 12 miles southwest of Fowler, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Pueblo County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
